overview_of_class: Sketching is intended to increase one's skills in a basic but essential form of communication; it's the medium used by all for preliminary ideation. In this course you will understand basic rules and develop your skills in a design studio setting.
name: Introduction to Design Sketching
title: MEAS DSGN 220-0-1 Introduction to Design Sketching

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Sketching is intended to increase one's skills in a basic but essential form of communication; it's the medium used by all for preliminary ideation. In this course you will understand basic rules and develop your skills in a design studio setting.

subject: DSGN
